author: Tina Nguyen
title: Big Tech quietly sponsors Trump’s military parade party
description: The US taxpayer is going to be on the hook for all the soldiers, tanks, and planes that appear in Donald Trump's military parade. But several major tech companies are paying for the festivities along the parade route. According to recent statements from Ameri…
content:
This weekend, tanks will roll through the streets of Washington, funded by taxpayer money and donations from big tech.
